ygData.subject: Re: Lockjaw Vest
ygData.msgSnippet: Everything depends on your level little friend. But 30pp is the regular price for this tunic (30-40pp I think). May be you won t need it in the future because
ygData.messageBody:
Everything depends on your level little friend. But 30pp is the regular
price for this tunic (30-40pp I think). May be you won't need it in the
future because you will find better, plus your dwarven stamina is high
enough I guess (+5 STA). But it is a must for monks (who can not wear chain,
banded, plates, etc.). You will have no difficulty to sell it to a monk for
a good price.
�
Erwin, Paladin of Tunare, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Joseph E. Nisse [mailto:nisse@...]
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 10:45 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Lockjaw Vest


I spent 30p on a Lockjaw vest last night. Was this a fair price? Was it a
good investment? (Doesn't matter since I already paid for it, eh) Thanks for
any input.
�
--Bruceson, Dwarven Paladin, Tunare
